name: MovieClassics
0:
”Alexa, launch movie classics”
”Alexa, ask movie classics to play something”
”Alexa, ask movie classics to skip this one”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie classics
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Some of the best movies ever happen to be in the public domain since their copyrights have lapsed. Enjoy watching these classics on any of your video-enabled echo devices. If your echo device doesn't support video, no worries, you can still enjoy radio shows from the Golden Age of American radio. 

Media in the public domain means that no government, company, organization or individual owns them. They are considered part of the public cultural heritage and may be freely watched and used by all. The free flow of creative work is of vital importance to transfer knowledge, educate and culture our young one and society. 

This skill currently configured to play a random classic movie when you utter: Alexa, ask movie classics to play something.
If you want to skip a movie and move on to the next one, say: Alexa, ask movie classics to skip this one. 
To stop watching, say: Alexa, ask movie classics to stop. 

We strive to bring you more great content, If you have a favorite movie or a show that you would like to add to the list, please email us at info@cloudpixel.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
